message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. Could we negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could consider letting it go for $17,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I am still unable to meet the price of $17,000. Would you consider lowering it to $15,000?
